balancedflight.ascended_blackstone.toolt: Crafting item for Flight Anchors and Flight Cores.
tooltip.balancedflight.ascended_flight_a: Allows flight in a 100 block radius. Only works in the overworld.
tooltip.balancedflight.ascended_flight_r: An incredibly dense golden ring, and yet, it allows flight anywhere.
tooltip.balancedflight.basic_flight_anch: Allows flight in a 25 block radius. Only works in the overworld.
tooltip.balancedflight.basic_flight_ring: Allows flight around flight anchors. Only works in the overworld.
tooltip.balancedflight.flight_core: Crafting item for the Ascended Flight Ring.
tooltip.balancedflight.gilded_flight_anc: Allows flight in a 50 block radius. Only works in the overworld.
